name: metal-burst
caption: Metal Burst

effect.short: Strikes back at the last Pokémon to hit the user this turn with 1.5× the damage.
effect.full: Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a damaging move this turn.  Inflicts 1.5× the damage that move did to the user.  If there is no eligible target, this move will [fail]{mechanic:fail}.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.

flavorText:
The user retaliates with much greater force against
the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.
